definition: to hand over/to deliver/to pay (money)/to turn over/to make friends/to intersect (lines)/variant of 跤[jiao1]
to try to gain sb's friendship
to try to form friendly ties with sb for one's own benefit/to suck up to sb
to be very close/to understand each other

sentences.english: I've only got the afternoon, but I had to see you for old times' sake .
sentences.chinese: 我只有這一個下午，但爲了老交情，我還是看你來了。

sentences.english: The strong bond between Rachel and her fans can be felt from the interaction with her fans at the .
sentences.chinese: 和粉絲的交情從《粉絲同樂會》的互動中便能察覺。

sentences.english: The Krays were in with a couple of well-known MPs.
sentences.chinese: 克賴一家與幾個著名的國會議員有很好的交情。

sentences.english: B woman who can't forgive should never have more than a nodding acquaintance with a man.
sentences.chinese: 不懂饒恕的孺人永恆只能是漢子的頷首的交情。

sentences.english: What we can talk about depends on how well we know a person.
sentences.chinese: 到底能談些什麼，端賴我們跟一個人交情有多深。

sentences.english: Don't scruple. I know you are attached to them.
sentences.chinese: 不用顧慮，我知道你跟他們有交情。

sentences.english: He had been thinking all the time of his "pull" with the race-track magnates.
sentences.chinese: 他一直在想着他和賽馬場那些巨頭們的交情。

sentences.english: As for don't even want the friendships in ten-year.
sentences.chinese: 至於連近十年的交情都不要了。

sentences.english: They Laojiaoqing, more open and harmless joke.
sentences.chinese: 他們是老交情，開些玩笑並無傷大雅。

sentences.english: Evidently he expected to restore their old friendship at once and without modification.
sentences.chinese: 很顯然，他是想立刻原原本本地恢復他們往日的交情。

sentences.english: The debts of the last generation should not influence relationships in the next generation.
sentences.chinese: 上一輩子的宿債不應該影響下一代的交情。

sentences.english: I am not surprised those two is such friends; they is birds of a feather.
sentences.chinese: 那兩個人交情這麼好我不驚訝，他們是一丘之貉嘛。

sentences.english: We are still new friends, theory friendship, seem to be still enough don't arrive?
sentences.chinese: 我們還是初交，論交情，似乎還夠不到吧？

sentences.english: Then I thought, no, we’d never been that kind of roommates.
sentences.chinese: 立刻，我又想，不，我們從來都沒有那種交情。
哪種選擇更能促進交情？

definition: a friend in times of tribulations (idiom); a friend in need is a friend indeed
an old grudge/old scores to settle
